snippet: Readers weigh in on my column arguing that access to birth control is crucial to public health, and must be made available as part of insurance packages offered by Catholic affiliated institutions.
abstract: Readers weigh in on my column arguing that access to birth control is crucial to public health, and must be made available as part of insurance packages offered by Catholic affiliated institutions.
lead_paragraph: My Sunday column looks at the debate over the Obama mandate for Catholic-affiliated universities and hospitals to carry insurance that includes contraceptives. I believe we should try to accommodate religious concerns where possible, but I also believe that birth control is far too important to be sacrificed. Read the column and post your thoughts, please.

headline.main: Readers Comment on my Pelvic Politics Column
